templete.title: check private network value
check sysctl.conf rp_filter
check /proc/meminfo AnonHugePages
check HugePages_Total and MemTotal ratio
check nr_hugepages and MemTotal ratio
templete.command: cat /etc/sysctl.conf| grep -v \# | grep nr_hugepages|awk '{print $1"|+|"$NF}';sudo cat /proc/meminfo |grep MemTotal|sed 's/:/|+|/g'|sed 's/ //g'

templete.title: check transparent_hugepage value
templete.resultset: compareres="" for row in actualval.splitlines(): ispass=status compareres=compareres+row+"|+|[never]|+|"+ispass+"\n"

templete.title: check MTU value
check whether sub disks status are all running
check scheduler value
check _vktm_ process Priority
check oradism directory mode|owner|group
templete.resultset: compareres="" for row in actualval.splitlines(): ispass=status compareres=compareres+row+"|+|-rwsr-x---_root_oinstall|+|"+ispass+"\n"

templete.title: check sysctl.conf shmmax|shmmni|shmall value
check sysctl.conf sem value
check sysctl.conf msgmni|msgmax|msgmnb value
check sysctl.conf sysrq value
check sysctl.conf file-max|aio-max-nr value
check sysctl.conf rmem value
check sysctl.conf wmem value
check sysctl.conf ip_local_port_range|tcp_keepalive_time value
check sysctl.conf ipanic_on_oops|pid_max value
check sysctl.conf numa_balancing value
check limits.conf nproc value
check limits.conf nofile value
check limits.conf memlock|core|stack value
check iptables|multi with chkconfig
check firewalld service status
check crond service status
check multipathd service status
check SELINUX from config
check SELINUX with getenforce
check irqbalance process
check ora.crf status
check numa_balancing config
check sqlnet
check OEM status
check diffence parameter from each instance
templete.command: with parameters as (select name,inst1,inst2,inst3,inst4,inst5,inst6 from (select inst_id, name, value from gv\$parameter where name not in ('background_dump_dest','core_dump_dest','instance_name','instance_number','local_listener','thread','undo_tablespace','user_dump_dest')) pivot(max(value) for inst_id in(1 as inst1, 2 as inst2, 3 as inst3, 4 as inst4, 5 as inst5, 6 as inst6))) select name||'|+|'||inst1||'|+|'||inst2||'|+|'||inst3||'|+|'||inst4||'|+|'||inst5||'|+|'||inst6 from parameters where inst2 <> inst1 or inst3 <> inst2 or inst4 <> inst3 or inst6 <> inst4 or inst6 <> inst5;

templete.title: check group# count peer instance
templete.command: select tb.thread#||'|+|'||count(1) from v\$logfile ta, v\$log tb where ta.group#=tb.group# group by tb.thread#;

templete.title: check logfile location
templete.command: SELECT group#||'|+|'||member from v\$logfile where member like '%DG_DATA%';

templete.title: check logfile size
templete.command: select group#||'|+|'||thread#||'|+|'||bytes/1024/1024 from v\$log order by thread#;

templete.title: check dba_rollback_segs status and count
templete.command: select tablespace_name||'|+|'||status||'|+|'||count(1) from dba_rollback_segs where tablespace_name<>'SYSTEM' group by tablespace_name,status order by tablespace_name;

templete.title: check tablespace usage
templete.command: select a.tablespace_name||'|+|'||trunc(a.bytes/1024/1024/1024,2)||'|+|'||trunc(c.bytes/1024/1024/1024,2)||'|+|'|| trunc((a.bytes-c.bytes)*100/a.bytes,0) ||'|+|'||trunc((c.bytes*100)/a.bytes,0) from SYS.SM\$TS_AVAIL A,SYS.SM\$TS_FREE C WHERE A.TABLESPACE_NAME=C.TABLESPACE_NAME AND A.TABLESPACE_NAME IN (select distinct tablespace_name from dba_tablespaces) and A.tablespace_name like 'UNDO%' order by a.tablespace_name ;

templete.title: check temporary file size
templete.command: select tablespace_name||'|+|'||trunc(sum(bytes)/1024/1024/1024) from dba_temp_files group by tablespace_name;

templete.title: check db undo
templete.command: select inst_id||'|+|'||name||'|+|'||value from gv\$parameter where name in ('undo_management','undo_retention');

templete.title: check db parameters
templete.command: select inst_id||'|+|'||name||'|+|'||value from gv\$parameter where name in ('sga_max_size','pga_aggregate_limit','pga_aggregate_target','awr_snapshot_time_offset','sga_target','compatible','memory_target','memory_max_target', '_use_adaptive_log_file_sync','_rollback_segment_count','NLS_CHARACTERSET','_lm_drm_disable','_gc_policy_minimum', '_client_enable_auto_unregister','cursor_bind_capture_destination','cursor_sharing', '_undo_autotune','open_cursors', 'session_cached_cursors','optimizer_capture_sql_plan_baselines','optimizer_use_sql_plan_baselines','_gc_affinity_locking', '_gc_read_mostly_locking') order by name,inst_id;

templete.title: check db parameter management_pack/ddl_logging
templete.command: select inst_id||'|+|'||name||'|+|'||value from gv\$parameter where name in ('control_management_pack_access','enable_ddl_logging');

templete.title: check db supplemental log status
templete.command: with temp as (select inst_id,name db_name,force_logging,SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN,SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_PK,SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_UI, SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_FK,SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_ALL from gv\$database ) select inst_id||'|+|'||db_name||'|+|'||quotas||'|+|'||val from temp unpivot (val for quotas in (SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_MIN,SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_PK,SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_UI,SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_FK,SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_DATA_ALL) ) t order by inst_id,quotas;

templete.title: check db GATHER_STATS jobs
templete.command: SELECT job_name||'|+|'||enabled||'|+|'||count(1) over() from dba_scheduler_jobs where job_name like 'GATHER_STATS%';

templete.title: check db profiles jobs
templete.command: select resource_name||'|+|'||limit from dba_profiles where profile='DEFAULT';

templete.title: check db hist wr config
templete.command: with temp as (select snap_interval,retention from dba_hist_wr_control) select quotas||'|+|'||val from temp unpivot(val for quotas in (snap_interval,retention)) t order by quotas;

templete.title: check db option
templete.command: select inst_id||'|+|'||parameter||'|+|'||value from gv\$option where parameter in ('OLAP','Data Mining','Real Application Testing', 'Unified Auditing') order by parameter,inst_id;

templete.title: check db autotask client
check db stmt audit opts
check db def audit opts
check db obj audit opts
check db audit unified enabled policies
